display.name: Fuse
display.description: Fuse Ember is a Layer 2 blockchain, designed for real-world payments and scalable Web3 adoption. Powered by Polygon CDK and zkRollup technology, Ember delivers fast, low-cost transactions. It features DAC-powered data availability, Agglayer interoperability, and native account abstraction.
